humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report states that 'LYMPH NODE STATUS, 11 OF 21 LYMPH NODES POSITIVE FOR CARCINOMA (11/21)'. This means that metastases were found in 11 out of 21 lymph nodes assessed. According to the provided rules, this corresponds to N1 stage, as N1 indicates metastases in 1 to 3 axillary lymph nodes. The exact number of positive lymph nodes falls within this range.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report indicates that 11 out of 21 lymph nodes are positive for carcinoma (11/21). This corresponds to pathologic N stage N1 in the American Joint Committee on Cancer (AJCC) staging system for breast cancer.
